Pre-Game Insights: Cameroon is the eighth favorite for the tournament
Cameroon has a historical penchant for delivering stellar performances in West Africa
Guinea has captured attention, especially after triumphing over Nigeria in their lone warm-up match last week
Guinea has encountered only one defeat in their last six matches, securing four victories and a draw
Miscellaneous Highlights: The scheduled match on January 15, 2024, at 5 pm, unfolds at the Stade de Yamoussoukro
Others: Despite being the eighth favorite, the Indomitable Lions might find solace in this lower-profile status, liberated from the weight of expectation
Cameroon boasts a historical penchant for delivering stellar performances in West Africa, having secured three AFCON titles in the region
Despite Cameroon’s illustrious record, Kaba Diawara’s side has dominated recent head-to-head encounters, clinching victories in 2021 and 2017
